discourse_list.title: [Proposal - Akita] Place 100% in the Based Loans Dog Pound

content.content: Greetings, all. I come with a simple solution to your dog problem. Based Loans is live: https://twitter.com/BasedProtocol/status/1398393295106097154?s=20 There’s an $AKITA market. Lock it up—all of it—and immediately start generating cash flow with the resulting APY. Let the market decide what to do with $AKITA from then on and do some cool shit with the yield.  Stay based.
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing a solution to a dog problem by suggesting to place 100% of $AKITA in the Based Loans Dog Pound to generate cash flow with the resulting APY. The author is advertising the proposal and explaining it. A 3rd party is giving entirely positive feedback on the proposal and extending to it.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Looking quickly at the based loans website it does not really inspire confidence and I don’t know how much more work it would add to the gitcoin stewards team to maintain this. So I disagree with this proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving entirely positive feedback on proposal
3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
None of the topics listed match
